meanings.sent1: She was the tannest person at the beach.
meanings.sent2: After a day in the sun, her skin became the tannest it had ever been.
meanings.sent3: The tannest dog in the park loved rolling in the sand.
meanings.sent4: The tannest sand dunes stretched for miles under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The tannest paint color reminded her of warm summer days.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the shades, she loved the tannest the most.
meanings.sent2: His favorite color was the tannest in the palette.
meanings.sent3: The tannest of the leather bags caught her eye in the store.
meanings.sent4: The tannest of the leaves signaled the arrival of autumn.
meanings.sent5: The tannest of the fabrics felt soft and warm to the touch.
